rukus.text: Toto Abamalaika baliboolela balia ababafwisinjia abakholela obubii emioyo chiabu, mbu: “Mwali murie?” nabo baliboola mbu:, “khwali kwasilwa khushialo.” Baliboolelwa; “eshialo shia Nyasaye sishiali nobwiyangu bwokhuwuya tawe?” Kho abo eshimenyo shiabu ni mumulilo (Jahanam, ) nako ni amakalushilo amabii muno
halali balia abali abateshele mu Basatsa nende Abakhasi nende Abana ababula obunyali bwokhunyoola injila yokhuwuya
Abo Nyasaye awundi alibaleshela, Ne Nyasaye ni omunji Wokhubeela Owobulesheli

Ne ulia uwuya khulwa Nyasaye, alanyoola tsimbeka sinyinji muno tsiokhwilushila, tsiyangufu. Ne ularula munzu mumwe nawuya khulwa Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe, mana lifwa limunyoole, oyo amalile okhutinyisia omurungo kukwe khu Nyasaye, Ne Nyasaye niye omulesheli owetsimbabaasi muno
